document_data.name: Turvon
document_data.source: [[The North: Guide to the Savage Frontier|N:GSF]]
document_data.mainbody:
'''Turvon''' was a member of the [[Hammers]], the [[Marchion]] of [[Mirabar]], currently [[Elastul Raurym|Elastul Raurym's]], personal bodyguards.
